questions.question: How long does it take for my order to arrive?
questions.answer: Delivery time varies depending on the restaurant and distance. On average, orders arrive in 30-45 minutes. You can see the estimated delivery time before placing the order.

questions.question: What is the delivery cost?
questions.answer: The delivery cost depends on the distance to your address and the chosen restaurant. Some restaurants offer free delivery for orders over a certain value. The exact cost is displayed before finalizing the order.

questions.question: Can I track my order in real-time?
questions.answer: Yes, after placing the order you can track its status in the 'My Orders' section of your account. You will receive notifications at every stage: order accepted, being prepared, picked up by courier, on its way to you.

questions.question: What should I do if the order is delayed?
questions.answer: If your order is delayed more than 15 minutes beyond the estimated time, please contact us via chat or phone. We will investigate the situation and find a quick solution.

questions.question: Do you deliver to any area?
questions.answer: The delivery area depends on each individual restaurant. When you enter your address, we will show you only the restaurants that deliver to your area.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: It's very simple! 1) Choose a restaurant from the list. 2) Add the desired products to the cart. 3) Check the cart and delivery address. 4) Choose the payment method. 5) Confirm the order. Done!

questions.question: Can I modify the order after placing it?
questions.answer: You can modify the order only within the first 2 minutes after placing it, as long as the restaurant has not started preparing it. After this interval, please contact us directly for assistance.

questions.question: Can I cancel an order?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel the order for free within the first 2 minutes. After the restaurant has started preparation, cancellation may involve partial fees. Contact us for more details.

questions.question: What is the minimum order value?
questions.answer: The minimum order value differs from restaurant to restaurant. This information is displayed on each restaurant's page.

questions.question: Can I order from multiple restaurants at once?
questions.answer: Currently, each order can be placed from a single restaurant. To order from multiple restaurants, you will need to place separate orders.

questions.question: Can I schedule an order for later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can schedule the order for a later time. During the ordering process, select the 'Schedule delivery' option and choose the desired date and time.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept: bank card (Visa, Mastercard, Maestro), cash or card on delivery, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and electronic meal vouchers/tickets.

questions.question: Is online payment secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We use SSL encryption and PCI-DSS certified payment processors. Your card details are not stored on our servers.

questions.question: Can I pay with meal tickets?
questions.answer: Yes, we accept electronic meal tickets from major providers: Sodexo, Edenred, Up Romania, Pluxee. Select this option at checkout.

questions.question: How does payment on delivery work?
questions.answer: You can pay the courier cash or with a card at the time of delivery. Please prepare the exact amount to facilitate the transaction.

questions.question: Can I receive an invoice for the order?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request a fiscal invoice while placing the order. Enter the billing details in the dedicated section and you will receive the invoice by email.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Click on 'Register' in the top right corner. You can create an account using your email or log in quickly with Google or Facebook.

questions.question: I forgot my password. What do I do?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot password' on the login page. Enter the email address associated with the account and you will receive a link to reset your password.

questions.question: How do I change my delivery address?
questions.answer: Go to your account, 'My Addresses' section. Here you can add, modify or delete delivery addresses. You can have multiple saved addresses.

questions.question: How do I delete my account?
questions.answer: To delete your account, go to Settings > Privacy > Delete Account. This action is permanent and all data will be deleted.

questions.question: Can I have multiple saved addresses?
questions.answer: Yes, you can save multiple addresses (home, work, etc.). When placing an order, choose the desired address from the list of saved addresses.

questions.question: How do I choose a good restaurant?
questions.answer: You can use the available filters: rating, average price, cuisine type, delivery time. We recommend checking other customers' reviews to make the best choice.

questions.question: What does the 'Verified' badge mean?
questions.answer: The 'Verified' badge indicates that the restaurant has passed our verification process and meets the platform's quality standards.

questions.question: How can I see a product's ingredients?
questions.answer: Click on any product to see the full description, ingredients, allergen information, and nutritional values (where available).

questions.question: Can I customize menu items?
questions.answer: Yes, many products allow customization: adding or removing ingredients, choosing size, selecting sauces, etc. Options are displayed on the product page.

questions.question: What if I have food allergies?
questions.answer: Allergen information is displayed on each product page. You can also add a special note to the order. For severe allergies, we advise you to contact the restaurant directly.

questions.question: How does sorting by average price work?
questions.answer: A restaurant's average price is calculated as the average of all menu item prices. You can sort restaurants from most affordable to most expensive.

questions.question: How can I leave a review?
questions.answer: After completing the order, you can rate the restaurant directly from its page. Select the number of stars (1-5) to give your rating.

questions.question: Can I modify or delete my rating?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify your rating anytime by accessing the restaurant page and selecting a new score. You can also completely withdraw the rating using the 'Withdraw Rating' button.

questions.question: How is a restaurant's rating calculated?
questions.answer: The rating is the arithmetic average of all evaluations received from customers. Each customer can give only one rating per restaurant.

questions.question: How do I add a restaurant to favorites?
questions.answer: Click on the heart icon on the restaurant card or details page. Favorite restaurants can be quickly accessed from the 'Favorites' section of your account.

questions.question: Is my cart saved?
questions.answer: Yes, your cart is saved automatically as long as you are logged in. You can return anytime to finalize the order.

questions.question: Can I move items from cart to favorites?
questions.answer: Products can be added to favorites directly from the restaurant menu. The cart and favorites list are managed separately.

questions.question: How can I become a partner and add my restaurant?
questions.answer: If you have a restaurant and want to join our platform, contact us or register as a Collaborator. You will be able to add your restaurant, which will be verified by our team before going public.

questions.question: How long does the restaurant approval process take?
questions.answer: The verification process normally takes 1-3 working days. You will be notified by email when your restaurant is approved or if we need additional information.

questions.question: What documents are needed for registration?
questions.answer: To register a restaurant you need: fiscal registration certificate, operating permit, photos of the restaurant and menu, and contact details.

questions.question: I received a wrong order. What do I do?
questions.answer: We are sorry for the inconvenience! Contact us immediately via chat or phone with order details and photos of the products received. We will resolve the situation as quickly as possible.

questions.question: The food arrived cold. Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Please contact us within 30 minutes of receiving the order. We will analyze the situation and, depending on the case, offer a partial refund or credit for a future order.

questions.question: How do I contact the support team?
questions.answer: You can contact us via: live chat available in the app, email at support@gogogo.ro, or by phone at the number displayed in the Contact section. Support hours: Monday-Sunday, 09:00-23:00.

questions.question: I have a suggestion for the platform. Where do I send it?
questions.answer: We appreciate your feedback! You can send suggestions through the 'Feedback' section in the app or by email to feedback@gogogo.ro. We read every message!

questions.question: How do I apply a promo code?
questions.answer: On the checkout page, find the 'Promo code' field. Enter the code and click 'Apply'. The discount will be automatically displayed in the order total.

questions.question: Can I use multiple codes on the same order?
questions.answer: Generally, only one promo code can be applied per order. Some special offers may be cumulative - check the terms and conditions of each promotion.

questions.question: Where can I find active promotions?
questions.answer: Active promotions are displayed on the main page, in the 'Special Offers' section. You will also receive notifications about new promotions if you have enabled notifications.
